languages.text: "Тогда, по правилам ритуала, ему следует преподнести в ответ дар не менее ценный по вкладу душевному или материальному. И если вам... вашему другу интересно, традиции требуют делать это через третье лицо. Таким образом даритель и одариваемый сохраняют баланс в отношениях".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда, по правилам ритуала, ему следует преподнести в ответ дар не менее ценный по вкладу душевному или материальному. И если вам... вашему другу интересно, традиции требуют делать это через третье лицо. Таким образом даритель и одариваемый сохраняют баланс в отношениях".

languages.text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."
languages.original_text: "Тогда, по правилам ритуала, ему следует преподнести в ответ дар не менее ценный по вкладу душевному или материальному. И если вам... вашему другу интересно, традиции требуют делать это через третье лицо. Таким образом даритель и одариваемый сохраняют баланс в отношениях".

traits.locale_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

"Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

"Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

"Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

languages.text: «Entonces, como dictan los cánones del ritual, debe ofrecer a cambio un regalo con un valor espiritual o material equivalente. Y si usted... es decir, si su amigo está interesado, la tradición dicta que este regalo se haga a través de una tercera persona. De ese modo tanto el obsequiador como la persona obsequiada preservan el equilibrio de su relación».
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, como dictan los cánones del ritual, debe ofrecer a cambio un regalo con un valor espiritual o material equivalente. Y si usted... es decir, si su amigo está interesado, la tradición dicta que este regalo se haga a través de una tercera persona. De ese modo tanto el obsequiador como la persona obsequiada preservan el equilibrio de su relación».

languages.text: 「その場合、儀式のしきたりにのっとって、彼はそれと同等の精神的または物質的価値のある贈り物を返さなければなりません。あなた…ではなく、あなたのご友人にその気があるなら、この贈り物は第三者の手によって作られたものでなければならないと伝統で決まっています。そうすることで、贈る側と贈られる側の関係のバランスが保たれます」
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: 「その場合、儀式のしきたりにのっとって、彼はそれと同等の精神的または物質的価値のある贈り物を返さなければなりません。あなた…ではなく、あなたのご友人にその気があるなら、この贈り物は第三者の手によって作られたものでなければならないと伝統で決まっています。そうすることで、贈る側と贈られる側の関係のバランスが保たれます」

languages.text: “那么，根据仪式的规定，他必须提供拥有同等精神价值或物质价值的礼物作为回赠。如果你……我是说，如果你的朋友对此感兴趣的话，我可以告诉你。传统规定，这件礼物必须通过第三方来转交给对方。通过这样的方式，送礼者与受礼者就能达成平等的关系。”
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: “那么，根据仪式的规定，他必须提供拥有同等精神价值或物质价值的礼物作为回赠。如果你……我是说，如果你的朋友对此感兴趣的话，我可以告诉你。传统规定，这件礼物必须通过第三方来转交给对方。通过这样的方式，送礼者与受礼者就能达成平等的关系。”

languages.text: « Selon les règles du rituel, {mf|il|elle} doit alors offrir en retour un cadeau d'une valeur spirituelle ou matérielle équivalente. Et si vous... Enfin, si votre {mf|ami|amie} souhaite répondre favorablement, la tradition veut que ce cadeau soit fait par l'intermédiaire d'une tierce personne. Ainsi, le donateur et le bénéficiaire préservent l'équilibre dans leurs relations. »
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: « Selon les règles du rituel, {mf|il|elle} doit alors offrir en retour un cadeau d'une valeur spirituelle ou matérielle équivalente. Et si vous... Enfin, si votre {mf|ami|amie} souhaite répondre favorablement, la tradition veut que ce cadeau soit fait par l'intermédiaire d'une tierce personne. Ainsi, le donateur et le bénéficiaire préservent l'équilibre dans leurs relations. »

languages.text: "Dann muss er gemäß den Regeln des Rituals ein Gegengeschenk von gleichem spirituellen oder materiellen Wert machen. Und wenn Ihr ... Ich meine, wenn Euer Freund interessiert ist, schreibt die Tradition vor, dass dieses Geschenk durch einen Dritten überreicht wird. So bewahren der Schenkende und der Beschenkte ein Gleichgewicht in ihrer Beziehung."
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: "Dann muss er gemäß den Regeln des Rituals ein Gegengeschenk von gleichem spirituellen oder materiellen Wert machen. Und wenn Ihr ... Ich meine, wenn Euer Freund interessiert ist, schreibt die Tradition vor, dass dieses Geschenk durch einen Dritten überreicht wird. So bewahren der Schenkende und der Beschenkte ein Gleichgewicht in ihrer Beziehung."

languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

languages.text: "O hâlde âdetin kuralları doğrultusunda, hediye karşılığında manevi veya maddi değerinin dengi bir hediye vermeli. Sen... Daha doğrusu arkadaşın bununla ilgileniyorsa da geleneğe göre bu hediye, üçüncü bir taraf aracılığıyla teslim edilmelidir. Bu şekilde hediyeyi veren ve alan arasındaki ilişki dengesi korunabilir."
languages.original_text: "Then, according to the rules of the ritual, he must offer a gift of equal spiritual or material value in return. And if you... I mean, your friend is interested, tradition dictates that this gift be made through a third party. That way, the giver and the receiver of the gift maintain a balance in their relations."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde âdetin kurallarına göre, hediyenin karşılığında manevi veya maddi değerinin denginde bir hediye vermeli. Eğer sen... Daha doğrusu arkadaşın bununla ilgileniyorsa, geleneğe göre bu hediye, üçüncü bir taraf aracılığıyla teslim edilmelidir. Bu şekilde hediyeyi veren ve alan arasındaki ilişki dengesi korunabilir."
